content:
Today I chose PR 11545 for discussion!

WIP feat(*): define subobject classes up to subfield_class
Created by @Anne Baanen (@Vierkantor) on 2022-01-18
Labels: WIP, merge-conflict

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
I closed this PR: this is not going to happen until we figure out how to redo the coes in mathlib 4.
Anne Baanen has marked this topic as resolved.
